title: Morning Sunlight with Courtyard View! Near Downtown & Caltrain!
posting_body: Welcome to eaves Mountain View at Middlefield – where a sensible apartment lifestyle meets a sensible cost of living.
We offer quality Mountain View apartments with a few little extras, like private patios and balconies, generous closet space and crown molding.
Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living.
Simply put, our apartments in Mountain View offer more of what you hope for.
Better than you bargained for.
So, what are you waiting for?
Mountain View Apartments by eaves The Mountain View apartments are conveniently located close to everything you need to make your stay comfortable.
eaves Mountain View at Middlefield gives you access to the best of the Silicon Valley.

Living here means you are within a few minutes of any one of the Bay Area's tech giants and have easy access to Highway 101 or 280 to zip into the city or connect with nature at one of the many surrounding open spaces.
Here, you can strike a balance between work and play.
Mountain View Apartment Community
The comfort and conveniences offered at Mountain View at Middlefield will surpass your expectations.
It's easy to entertain friends at the pool or barbecue area, or by practicing your serve at one of the three tennis courts.
We will sort out any issues that crop up, quickly and smoothly, allowing you to focus on the important parts of your life.
Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in Mountain View today.
-High-Speed WiFi
